topic.title: EMS Procedures Performed Section - conformance rules

section.p: Information regarding procedures performed by the EMS personnel or by others prior to EMS unit arrival

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11404 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.21"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="29554-3" Procedure Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Procedures Performed Section" (CONF:10492)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:6277)
Conforms to Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.181:2022-01-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10490)/@code="29554-3" Procedure Narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10489)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Procedures Performed Section" (CONF:10492)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:6277)
Conforms to Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.181:2022-01-01)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.21" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="29554-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Procedure Narrative"/> <title/> <text/> </section>
